Portal 2 is one of my all-time favorite games. To someone unfamiliar with the game, this may seem strange: how a puzzle game can be one of your favorite games. The fact is that Portal 2 has a pretty good storyline, memorable characters, a lot of secrets, and content. There is also a co-op company, which allowed us to spend more than 10 bonus hours in the game.

A must-have for all pc gamers.
